articles.title: Over 150 unvaccinated kids quarantined for 21 days in SC measles outbreak - Ars Technica
articles.description: The outbreak includes at least seven confirmed cases, but some are clearly being missed.

articles.author: Thomas Claburn
articles.title: Android 'Pixnapping' attack can capture app data like 2FA codes - theregister.com
articles.description: : GPU-based timing attack inspired by decade-old iframe technique
articles.content:
Security researchers have resurrected a 12-year-old data-stealing attack on web browsers to pilfer sensitive info from Android devices.
The attack, dubbed Pixnapping, has yet to be mitigated. Concep… [+6202 chars]
